attributes.action: The UK government has to condemn the terrorists in Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
The UN report last month stated that terrorists in Syria were the only ones to have used chemical weapons. This directly contradicts the UK government's bizarre statements.

Any civilized country has to condemn the atrocities committed by the foreign based Al Qaeda terrorists in Syria. Recent weeks have shown them commit public execution of children because of 'blasphemy', cannibalism, on the spot executions based on religion/ ethnicity, daily terrorist activity resulting in multiple civilian deaths.
